original_text: let us draw near to God with a sincere heart and with the full assurance that faith brings, having our hearts sprinkled to cleanse us from a guilty conscience and having our bodies washed with pure water.
korean_text: 우리가 마음에 뿌림을 받아 악한 양심으로부터 벗어나고 몸은 맑은 물로 씻음을 받았으니 참 마음과 온전한 믿음으로 하나님께 나아가자

sentences.original_text: let us draw near to God
and with the full assurance that faith brings
having our hearts sprinkled to cleanse us
sentences.korean_translation: 우리의 마음이 뿌려져서 우리를 정결하게 하고

sentences.original_text: and having our bodies washed with pure water
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 우리의 몸이 맑은 물로 씻겨졌으니
